Brian Oladapo Idowu ( onye Russia ; amụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 18 n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 1992) bụ onye Naijiria na-agba bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ na-agba bọọlụ n'aka ekpe maka klọb Khimki na ndị otu mba Naịjirịa.
A mụrụ ya na Saint Petersburg site na nna ya bụ onye Naijiria na nne ya bụ onye Russia na Naijiria, Idowu kwagara Owerri, Nigeria mgbe ọ dị obere, ma mesịa laghachi Russia.
O mere egwuregwu mbụ ya na Russian Premier League maka FC Amkar Perm na 6 Mee 2012 na egwuregwu megide FC Terek Grozny

Mgbe ọ gbazinyere Dynamo St Petersburg ego n'oge 2013-14, Idowu bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ 3 ọhụrụ na Amkar na 30 June 2014, na-agbatị nkwekọrịta ya ọzọ na February 2017 ruo oge okpomọkụ nke 2020.
Na ụbọchị nke iri n'ọnwa Julaị 2018, ọ bịanyere aka na nkwekọrịta afọ 3 na FC Lokomotiv Moscow
Na 7 Ọgọstụ 2020, ọ sonyeere Khimki na mgbazinye ego maka oge 2020-21.
Na 7 June 2021, ọ kwagara Khimki na ntọala na-adịgide adịgide, na-etinye aka na nkwekọrịta afọ 2 na nhọrọ mgbakwunye afọ 1 ọzọ.

N'ọnwa Nọvemba afọ 2017, a kpọrọ Idowu ka ọ bụrụ onye otu mba Naịjirịa maka enyi na enyi ha na Argentina na Krasnodar na 14 Nọvemba afọ 2017. Idowu mere egwuregwu izizi ya megide Argentina na 14 Nọvemba, na-abịa dị ka onye nnọchi anya ọkara oge maka Ola Aina, ma nye goolu nke atọ nke Naịjirịa na mmeri 4-2.
N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2018, a kpọrọ ya aha na ndị otu egwuregwu iri abụọ na atọ nke Naịjirịa maka 2018 FIFA World Cup na Russia.
Nne ya bụ ọkara onye Russia, ọkara onye Naijiria
A mụrụ ya ma zụlite ya na St

Petersburg, ma e wezụga oge ọ dị afọ 3 ruo 6 mgbe ọ bi na Owerri, Nigeria. Idowu na-asụ asụsụ Russian zuru oke ma rụọ ọrụ dị ka onye nsụgharị nke ndị otu mba Naịjirịa na ogbako mgbasa ozi tupu oge egwuregwu na Krasnodar na Nọvemba 2017.
